title.narrative: Promote female talents digital arts FP

description.narrative: Encourage the participation of young people and women in economic, social and political life through awareness-raising actions around current socio-economic issues through Art and Culture Our main mission is to encourage the participation of citizens in economic,social and political life through awareness-raising actions around current socio-economic issues through Art and Culture. From the creation of the association, we have carried out projects aimed at developing resilient communities and highlighting the cultural and social barriers that women and girls face and their impact on the economic development and prosperity of the communities. It is inthis sense that we continue our efforts by creating new opportunities for women and girls in a creative and alternative industry that has long been reserved for men. The association "Our culture of first" is an entity which, created in January 2012 in an informaland spontaneous but extremely determined way via experienced and recognized activists in the cultural and artistic sector in Tunisia. The association is legally registered under the code: 2012R01808APSF1 at the JORT of the Republic of Tunisia, bearing the fiscal number: 1320260 / H, based on its independent premises at 5 Rue de Cyprus, Mutuelle Ville 1082 Tunis.
